1_day.interpretation: There is a weak negative correlation (-0.1396) between sentiment and 1_day returns that is significant (p=0.0000)

2_day.interpretation: There is a weak negative correlation (-0.1104) between sentiment and 2_day returns that is significant (p=0.0006)

3_day.interpretation: There is a weak negative correlation (-0.1149) between sentiment and 3_day returns that is significant (p=0.0003)

logistic_regression.interpretation: logistic_regression shows poor predictive performance with 49.7% accuracy for Returns_1d_binary

random_forest.interpretation: random_forest shows weak predictive performance with 51.4% accuracy for Returns_1d_binary

logistic_regression.interpretation: logistic_regression shows moderate predictive performance with 55.1% accuracy for Returns_2d_binary

random_forest.interpretation: random_forest shows moderate predictive performance with 60.0% accuracy for Returns_2d_binary

logistic_regression.interpretation: logistic_regression shows moderate predictive performance with 58.4% accuracy for Returns_3d_binary

random_forest.interpretation: random_forest shows good predictive performance with 60.5% accuracy for Returns_3d_binary

key_findings: Strongest correlation found: 1_day returns show -0.1396 correlation with sentiment
CONTRARIAN PATTERN: All time horizons show negative sentiment-return correlations, suggesting contrarian market behavior
